responsibilities.turbo.json: Turborepo pipeline configuration for build/dev/lint tasks
responsibilities.CLAUDE.md: Agent coding instructions and project conventions
responsibilities.packages/shared: Shared Zod schemas, TypeScript types, enums, and constants used across all packages
responsibilities.packages/shared/src/enums.ts: Domain enums: UserRole, MembershipRole, TaskStatus, TaskPriority, AssigneeRole, SprintStatus, EventType
responsibilities.packages/shared/src/common.ts: Base entity schema, pagination schemas, API response types, generateUUID utility
responsibilities.packages/shared/src/models/task.ts: Task model: Zod schemas and types for Task, CreateTask, UpdateTask, AcceptanceItem, DispatchTask
responsibilities.packages/shared/src/models/sprint.ts: Sprint model: Zod schemas and types for Sprint, CreateSprint, UpdateSprint
responsibilities.packages/shared/src/models/workspace.ts: Workspace model: Zod schemas and types for Workspace, ChecklistItem, WorkspaceStats
responsibilities.packages/shared/src/models/user.ts: User model: Zod schemas and types for User, CreateUser, UpdateUser
responsibilities.packages/shared/src/models/auth.ts: Authentication models: JWT/API-key auth user types, OTP schemas, API key management schemas
responsibilities.packages/shared/src/models/doc.ts: Document model: Zod schemas for Doc, CreateDoc, UpdateDoc with DocType enum
responsibilities.packages/shared/src/models/doc-group.ts: Document group model: Zod schemas for DocGroup, CreateDocGroup, UpdateDocGroup
Organization model: Zod schemas for Organization, membership management
responsibilities.packages/shared/src/models/invitation.ts: Invitation model: Zod schemas for Invitation, CreateInvitation, AcceptInvitation
responsibilities.packages/shared/src/models/agent.ts: Agent model: Lock/Unlock schemas, AgentHeartbeat, agent registration types
responsibilities.packages/shared/src/models/activity.ts: Activity model: Comment, Artifact, Event schemas with typed event payloads
responsibilities.packages/shared/src/models/ci.ts: CI model: RecordCi schema for CI/CD result recording
responsibilities.packages/sdk: Core SDK: API client, orchestrator, AI runners, planning, worktree management, exec sessions
responsibilities.packages/sdk/src/index.ts: SDK entry point: exports LocusClient class with modular API (auth, tasks, sprints, workspaces, etc.)
responsibilities.packages/sdk/src/events.ts: SDK event system: LocusEvent enum, LocusConfig interface, LocusEmitter typed event emitter
responsibilities.packages/sdk/src/orchestrator.ts: AgentOrchestrator: spawns and manages multiple agent worker processes, handles task assignment and heartbeats
responsibilities.packages/sdk/src/core/config.ts: SDK configuration: Provider constants, default models, .locus directory paths, gitignore patterns
responsibilities.packages/sdk/src/core/indexer.ts: CodebaseIndexer: generates and maintains codebase index (symbols + responsibilities) with incremental updates
responsibilities.packages/sdk/src/core/prompt-builder.ts: PromptBuilder: constructs AI prompts from task data, project context, CLAUDE.md, skills, and codebase index
responsibilities.packages/sdk/src/agent/worker.ts: AgentWorker: main agent loop - claims tasks, executes via AI, reports results, manages per-task worktrees
responsibilities.packages/sdk/src/agent/task-executor.ts: TaskExecutor: single-pass task execution via AI runner with prompt building
responsibilities.packages/sdk/src/agent/review-service.ts: ReviewService: AI-powered code review on staged git changes
responsibilities.packages/sdk/src/agent/codebase-indexer-: CodebaseIndexerService: wraps CodebaseIndexer with AI-powered tree summarization
DocumentFetcher: fetches workspace documents from API and saves to local .locus/documents
responsibilities.packages/sdk/src/ai/runner.ts: AiRunner interface: defines run(), runStream(), abort() contract for AI providers
responsibilities.packages/sdk/src/ai/claude-runner.ts: ClaudeRunner: AiRunner implementation using Claude CLI subprocess
responsibilities.packages/sdk/src/ai/codex-runner.ts: CodexRunner: AiRunner implementation using OpenAI Codex CLI subprocess
responsibilities.packages/sdk/src/ai/factory.ts: createAiRunner factory: creates ClaudeRunner or CodexRunner based on provider config
responsibilities.packages/sdk/src/planning/plan-manager.t: PlanManager: save, load, list, approve, reject, cancel sprint plans on disk and via API
responsibilities.packages/sdk/src/planning/sprint-plan.ts: Sprint plan types and utilities: SprintPlan, PlannedTask, markdown rendering, API payload conversion, AI output parsing
responsibilities.packages/sdk/src/planning/planning-meeti: PlanningMeeting: multi-phase AI planning pipeline (Tech Lead → Architect → Sprint Organizer)
responsibilities.packages/sdk/src/planning/agents/tech-le: Tech Lead persona: Phase 1 prompt builder for initial task breakdown from CEO directive
responsibilities.packages/sdk/src/planning/agents/archite: Architect persona: Phase 2 prompt builder for task refinement, dependency analysis, risk assessment
responsibilities.packages/sdk/src/planning/agents/sprint-: Sprint Organizer persona: Phase 3 prompt builder for final sprint plan with ordering and estimates
responsibilities.packages/sdk/src/worktree/worktree-manag: WorktreeManager: git worktree lifecycle (create, list, remove, prune) for parallel agent isolation
responsibilities.packages/sdk/src/worktree/worktree-confi: Worktree configuration types and defaults: WorktreeConfig, CreateWorktreeOptions, WorktreeInfo
responsibilities.packages/sdk/src/exec/exec-session.ts: ExecSession: manages AI execution with conversation history persistence, streaming, and context tracking
responsibilities.packages/sdk/src/exec/event-emitter.ts: ExecEventEmitter: typed event emitter for execution progress events
responsibilities.packages/sdk/src/exec/events.ts: ExecEventType enum: defines all execution event types
responsibilities.packages/sdk/src/exec/history-manager.ts: HistoryManager: persists conversation sessions to disk with pruning
responsibilities.packages/sdk/src/exec/context-tracker.ts: ContextTracker: tracks artifacts and tasks within a session for reference resolution
responsibilities.packages/sdk/src/exec/types.ts: Exec stream types: StreamChunk union for text_delta, tool_use, tool_result, thinking, error, result
responsibilities.packages/sdk/src/modules/base.ts: BaseModule: abstract base class for SDK API modules with shared axios instance and emitter
responsibilities.packages/sdk/src/modules/tasks.ts: TasksModule: API client methods for task CRUD, comments, dispatch, and availability queries
responsibilities.packages/sdk/src/modules/sprints.ts: SprintsModule: API client methods for sprint CRUD, start, complete, AI planning trigger
responsibilities.packages/sdk/src/modules/auth.ts: AuthModule: API client methods for OTP auth, profile, API key management
responsibilities.packages/sdk/src/modules/workspaces.ts: WorkspacesModule: API client methods for workspace CRUD, members, dispatch, heartbeat, stats
responsibilities.packages/sdk/src/modules/organizations.t: OrganizationsModule: API client methods for org CRUD and membership management
responsibilities.packages/sdk/src/modules/invitations.ts: InvitationsModule: API client methods for invitation CRUD and acceptance
responsibilities.packages/sdk/src/modules/docs.ts: DocsModule: API client methods for document and doc group CRUD
responsibilities.packages/sdk/src/modules/ci.ts: CiModule: API client methods for CI/CD result recording
KnowledgeBase: manages .locus/project/context.md and progress.md for project-level context
responsibilities.packages/sdk/src/utils/colors.ts: Terminal color utilities for CLI output formatting
responsibilities.packages/sdk/src/utils/retry.ts: RetryOptions type for configurable retry behavior
responsibilities.packages/cli: CLI application: locus command-line tool with run, exec, plan, init, index, review, agents commands
responsibilities.packages/cli/src/cli.ts: CLI entry point: parses commands and dispatches to handlers
responsibilities.packages/cli/src/commands/run.ts: run command: starts AgentOrchestrator with N agents for automated task execution
responsibilities.packages/cli/src/commands/exec.ts: exec command: single prompt execution or interactive REPL with streaming output
responsibilities.packages/cli/src/commands/plan.ts: plan command: triggers AI planning meeting, list/show/approve/reject/cancel plans
responsibilities.packages/cli/src/commands/init.ts: init command: initializes .locus directory, CLAUDE.md, and gitignore patterns
responsibilities.packages/cli/src/commands/review.ts: review command: AI-powered code review of staged changes
responsibilities.packages/cli/src/commands/index-codebase: index command: generates/updates codebase index via AI analysis
responsibilities.packages/cli/src/commands/agents.ts: agents command: lists active agents registered in the workspace
Session management subcommands for exec: list, show, delete, clear sessions
responsibilities.packages/cli/src/workspace-resolver.ts: WorkspaceResolver: resolves workspace ID from config, API key, or user prompt
responsibilities.packages/cli/src/tree-summarizer.ts: TreeSummarizer: uses AI to analyze file trees and produce codebase index
responsibilities.packages/cli/src/repl/interactive-sessio: InteractiveSession: REPL-based interactive AI execution with session persistence
responsibilities.packages/cli/src/display/stream-renderer: StreamRenderer: renders streaming AI output in the terminal
responsibilities.packages/cli/src/display/status-bar.ts: StatusBar: terminal status bar for long-running operations
responsibilities.packages/cli/src/display/progress-render: ProgressRenderer: renders tool execution progress with thinking indicators
responsibilities.packages/cli/src/display/tool-display.ts: ToolDisplay: formats tool usage information for terminal display
responsibilities.packages/cli/src/display/execution-stats: ExecutionStatsTracker: tracks and displays execution duration, tools used, and errors
responsibilities.packages/cli/src/utils/banner.ts: printBanner: displays CLI banner with version info
responsibilities.packages/cli/src/templates/skills.ts: Default agent skill templates for initialization
responsibilities.packages/ai-sdk: AI SDK package: LangChain-based LLM factory for higher-level AI integrations

responsibilities.packages/ai-sdk/src/core/llm-factory.ts: LLMFactory: creates LangChain chat models (Gemini supported, Claude/OpenAI planned)
responsibilities.packages/ai-sdk/src/tools/interfaces.ts: AI SDK tool interfaces for structured tool definitions
responsibilities.packages/ai-sdk/src/interfaces/context.t: AI SDK context interfaces for conversation and execution context
